about_the_game:
"Twisted Twins" is the new DLC of Soul at Stake, including a new Devil "the Twins", a new Gambler "Oliver", and a new map the "No.9 Residence".

EXTRA BONUS

The Twins gesture*1, the Twins' exclusive Trump*5, Oliver's exclusive Trump*5, and Oliver's Trump 【Bystander】*5.


NEW DEVIL: THE TWINS

A pair of twins with the same soul, inseparable, laughing innocently. The memories still remain like everblooming flowers, never wilting.

THE TWINS' ABILITY

The elder sister is controlled by players in the game. Under normal circumstances, the elder sister can't see the Gamblers, but she can still sense the aura of Gamblers nearby. The elder sister can place up to 6 dolls on the ground, and any Gambler who steps on a doll will wake up the younger sister. Once the Gamblers dodge, run, or avoid eye contact with the younger sister, she will teleport to bite them.

The elder sister is able to see the Gambler who is being stared by the young sister.
The Gamblers can get rid of the younger sister by staring at her and stepping back a certain distance, block her by closing the doors or windows, by using certain items, or by vaulting over windows.

THE TWINS' CHEATS

Reminiscence: There will be X dolls placed in the scene automatically at the beginning of the game. The younger sister will always carry her doll, and never abandon it.
Inseparable: The interval between the younger sister's teleportations is reduced to X seconds.

THE TWINS' EXCLUSIVE TRUMP

One Step Away: The distance required for the Gamblers to get rid of the younger sister increases by X meters. The closest distance in the world is the distance between life and death.

NEW GAMBLER: OLIVER

The living things who lost themselves are perplexed, not knowing where to go. Why not to regard the future as the way home, to find the real home and heart?

OLIVER'S CHEATS

Road's Gift: All the cards consumed by the Gamblers to heal themselves, or the cards in the hand of a dead Gambler will be sent back at most X to the store randomly.
Pilfering: Lasting 8 seconds within 9 meters of the Devil will steal X Stake from the Devil.

OLIVER'S EXCLUSIVE TRUMP

Leftovers: When a Gambler dies, the deceased's remaining Stakes will be split equally among the Gamblers who carry this Trump. Each Gambler may gain up to X Stakes.

NEW MAP: NO.9 RESIDENCE

The old, wooden door carved with western patterns, the mottled walls covered in vines, and the garden piled up with fallen leaves, all of these reveal the cold, bleak and lifeless.
It used to be a luxurious, foreign residence and home to a harmonious and happy family of four. Every friend complimented the host on his elegance and his family's state of harmony.
But overnight, the whole family disappeared.
The laurel tree in the garden bloomed as usual, knowing the secrets buried here. Who is singing that song...

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains a chase and slash game mode that uses sharp or blunt weapons, the screen will have a blood splash effect on a successful attack and during the execution event. The setting option "Bloody Mode" is available in the game. Turning off the "Bloody Mode" can change the blood color to green and has a mosaic occlusion when executed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7, Windows 8.1)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 Compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Low quality settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 960 or AMD R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 Compatible
